ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-A IMPACT High Energy Telescope, HET
ResourceHeader.Description: The High Energy Telescope (HET) is one of seven Instruments in the STEREO In-Situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients (IMPACT) Investigation. With a Linear Array of six Solid State Detectors, it measures Protons and Helium Ions up to 100 MeV/n and Electrons up to 5 MeV. For more Informaiton, see http://www.srl.caltech.edu/STEREO/docs/STEREO-HET-SSR.pdf.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC Master Catalog
